/branding.description: Provides operations to manage the organizationalBranding singleton.

/branding/backgroundImage.description: Provides operations to manage the media for the organizationalBranding entity.

get.summary: Get backgroundImage for organizationalBranding from branding
get.description: Image that appears as the background of the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG not smaller than 300 KB and not larger than 1920 × 1080 pixels. A smaller image will reduce bandwidth requirements and make the page load faster.

put.summary: Update backgroundImage for organizationalBranding in branding
put.description: Image that appears as the background of the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG not smaller than 300 KB and not larger than 1920 × 1080 pixels. A smaller image will reduce bandwidth requirements and make the page load faster.

/branding/bannerLogo.description: Provides operations to manage the media for the organizationalBranding entity.

get.summary: Get bannerLogo for organizationalBranding from branding
get.description: A banner version of your company logo that appears on the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 36 × 245 pixels. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.

put.summary: Update bannerLogo for organizationalBranding in branding
put.description: A banner version of your company logo that appears on the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 36 × 245 pixels. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.

/branding/localizations.description: Provides operations to manage the localizations property of the microsoft.graph.organizationalBranding entity.

get.description: Retrieve all localization branding objects, including the default branding.

post.description: Create a new organizationalBrandingLocalization object. This creates a localized branding and at the same time, the default branding if it doesn't exist. The default branding is created only once. It's loaded when a localized branding isn't configured for the user's browser language. To retrieve the default branding, see Get branding.

/branding/localizations/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/branding/localizations/{organizationalB.description: Provides operations to manage the localizations property of the microsoft.graph.organizationalBranding entity.

get.description: Add different branding based on a locale.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property localizations for branding

patch.summary: Update the navigation property localizations in branding

/branding/localizations/{organizationalB.description: Provides operations to manage the media for the organizationalBranding entity.

get.summary: Get backgroundImage for the navigation property localizations from branding
get.description: Image that appears as the background of the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG not smaller than 300 KB and not larger than 1920 × 1080 pixels. A smaller image will reduce bandwidth requirements and make the page load faster.

put.summary: Update backgroundImage for the navigation property localizations in branding
put.description: Image that appears as the background of the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG not smaller than 300 KB and not larger than 1920 × 1080 pixels. A smaller image will reduce bandwidth requirements and make the page load faster.

/branding/localizations/{organizationalB.description: Provides operations to manage the media for the organizationalBranding entity.

get.summary: Get bannerLogo for the navigation property localizations from branding
get.description: A banner version of your company logo that appears on the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 36 × 245 pixels. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.

put.summary: Update bannerLogo for the navigation property localizations in branding
put.description: A banner version of your company logo that appears on the sign-in page. The allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 36 × 245 pixels. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.

/branding/localizations/{organizationalB.description: Provides operations to manage the media for the organizationalBranding entity.

get.summary: Get squareLogo for the navigation property localizations from branding
get.description: A square version of your company logo that appears in Windows 10 out-of-box experiences (OOBE) and when Windows Autopilot is enabled for deployment. Allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 240 x 240 pixels and no more than 10 KB in size. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.

put.summary: Update squareLogo for the navigation property localizations in branding
put.description: A square version of your company logo that appears in Windows 10 out-of-box experiences (OOBE) and when Windows Autopilot is enabled for deployment. Allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 240 x 240 pixels and no more than 10 KB in size. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.

Allowed types are PNG or JPEG no larger than 240 x 240 pixels and no more than 10 KB in size. We recommend using a transparent image with no padding around the logo.
